summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 16W, Page 63 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 5511 - 43rd Avenue Northeast, 4320 through 4356 Northeast 55th Street and 4059 through 4490 Northeast 55th Street from Lowrise 2 (L-2) to Single Family 5000 (SF 5000). (Petition of Carl H. Neu; C.F. 295985).
